items.title: Giant 58% Cyber Monday deal hits Razer’s Pokémon Edition Cobra gaming mouse at $25 all-time, with mouse pad for $39
items.summary:
Over at Woot, you’ll find Razer’s Pokémon Edition Cobra gaming mouse currently fetching $24.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This particular model debuted in July, carrying a $60 price tag alongside the brand’s other Pokémon edition accessories, so you’re looking at a straight-up $35 discount on it today. That’s 58% off and the lowest price we have tracked for it to date – it previously dropped to $36 at Amazon where it’s currently at $40. Woot also has the matching Gigantus V2 Pokémon Edition mouse pad for $13.99 Prime shipped, down from its usual price of $30. You can essentially get this both as a set for just $39, which is a great price for limited-edition Pokémon-themed accessories. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Save up to 67% on 2x EcoFlow DELTA 2 power stations at $698 low + three accessory bundles from $799 for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday/Cyber Monday Sale event, EcoFlow has a flash sale with up to 67% discounts on four bundles that is ending tonight alongside the sale. Three of these offers are for doubled-up accessory add-ons, while one gives you two DELTA 2 Portable Power Stations at $698 shipped, matching the price you’d pay getting two at Amazon. Like the other bundles today, this is one of many we’ve seen pop up over the last few weeks during the different phases of this sale, with it coming down from its $1,998 full price to the same low rate we’ve seen before. The 66% markdown that lasts through the rest of the day cuts $1,300 from the tag for the best price we have tracked. Be sure to also head below for the two dual battery bundles and the solar panel bundles while they last.

more…

It’s now seeing its first discount at $20 off, just in time for the holidays. Google launched its Black Friday deals nice and early this year, they were subsequently matched at all major retailers, and now Amazon is undercut some of those deals as part of its Cyber Monday event. There are now select colors across all Pixel 10 and 10 Pro models that have dropped as much as $100 more from the Black Friday deals, alongside Pixel 9a, ongoing Pixel Watch 4 deals, and up to $96 off Pixel Buds Pro 2. Everything is waiting down below.

items.title: Score up to $13,289 exclusive Cyber Monday savings on EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Ultra X power station + bundles, more from $174
items.summary:
For Cyber Monday, we’ve secured a very special exclusive code from Wellbots that saves our readers an additional 10% on a large selection of offers on EcoFlow’s latest (and largest) backup power solution, with the DELTA Pro Ultra X Portable Power Station (1x inverter + 2x batteries) for $7,199.10 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5CMDPUX at checkout. This is the latest release from the brand, having opened for pre-sale discounts mid-October and officially hitting the market at the top of November carrying a $10,597 MSRP, which starts off lower at $8,299 here at Wellbots. Aside from the initial $1,000 pre-sale promotional discount, we’ve only seen this model taken down to $7,999 in early and full Black Friday sales from the brand, with this exclusive deal giving you a larger-than-ever, combined $1,100 off Wellbots’ starting rate ($3,398 off its MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it and check out the 18 other offers for this system.

items.title: Super rare deal lands on DJI’s Osmo Pocket 3 Standard/Creator bundles: Up to $310 off + FREE $25 gift card for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Cyber Monday sale, Best Buy is offering the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 4K handheld vlogging camera for $529.99 shipped. The retailer is even throwing in a FREE $25 gift card to make the deal even sweeter for Cyber Monday. This camera originally launched at $519, but it jumped up to around $800 after a series of price hikes over the last few months. It has rarely seen any discounts since it jumped up, and today’s Cyber Monday deal delivers a full $270 off – also matched at B&H as part of its Cyber Monday sale. The Creator Combo, which also climbed in price over the past year, is discounted to $669.99 shipped with a solid $310 Cyber Monday discount as well. This is the lowest we have seen this model and its Creator bundle fetch to date, outside a few limited Costco members-only promos since the hike, making this a great time to jump in if you’ve been waiting to pick up this vlogging camera. Head below for more details.

more…

Usually fetching $95 at full price, discounts over the year have been few and far between, and have gone as low as $70 once back during July’s Prime Day event. items.title: Lenovo’s budget-friendly 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with Tab Pen stylus hits $180 all-time low for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Cyber Monday sale, Lenovo is offering its 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with a Tab Pen stylus for $180.49 shipped once you enter promo code EXTRAFIVE during checkout. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year, carrying a $290 price tag, so you’re looking at a straight-up $110 discount on it today. We saw this variant with the stylus drop to $210 last month as part of the early Black Friday offers, but today’s deal shaves an additional $20 off to mark a new best price to beat. It is, in fact, now fetching the same price as just the tablet by itself without the stylus at Best Buy. Head below for more details, along with deals on some other Lenovo tablets.
